Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: That propranolol antagonizes the pressor effect of PPA is in contrast to the interaction in which propranolol enhances the pressor effect of norepinephrine .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the disease entities identified in the paragraph:

| Disease |
| --- |
| Propranolol |
| PPA (Pressor Potentiating Agent) |
| Norepinephrine |

In this paragraph, the following disease entities are mentioned:

1. Propranolol: This is the drug that is being studied in the paragraph.
2. PPA (Pressor Potentiating Agent): This is the drug that propranolol antagonizes (i.e., blocks the effect of).
3. Norepinephrine: This is the neurotransmitter that propranolol enhances the pressor effect of.

| PPA (Pressor Potentiating Agent) |

These are the only two disease entities mentioned in the paragraph.
